subject: Football
Retirement
lead_paragraph: La’Roi Glover, a six-time Pro Bowl selection at defensive tackle who once led the N.F.L. in sacks, announced his retirement Monday after 13 seasons.
snippet: La’Roi Glover, a six-time Pro Bowl selection at defensive tackle who once led the N.F.L. in sacks, announced his retirement Monday after 13 seasons.
